TopicTitle: DonLorenzo's Forum Campaign: To space, the moon and beyond

Articles.Content: Fair enough, I did say I would, thanks for reminding. I'll include the files I mentioned in that as well.

![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif) this is sad, this campaign was great fun. So I guess a big thanks is in order, you did a great job considering the numbers of people taking part and the difficulties of trying to keep it fair and balanced.

Thanks, that sentiment is much appreciated. I would've preferred to carry on but I think I've burned out a little. I'm really busy IRL atm and am not finding any joy in stress-KSPing. As I've mentioned, I might resume or run something again in the future, but no promises.
Thank you Don for running the campaign. It was great fun and I learned a lot with it in matters of rocket efficiency.
